verses.verse: וַיַּ֣רְא <S%H7200><s%> vai-Yar saw הָעָ֔ם <S%H5971><s%> ha-'Am, And when the people כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- for בֹשֵׁ֥שׁ <S%H954><s%> vo-Shesh delayed מֹשֶׁ֖ה <S%H4872><s%> mo-Sheh that Moses לָרֶ֣דֶת <S%H3381><s%> la-Re-det to come down מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> min- from הָהָ֑ר <S%H2022><s%> ha-Har; out of the mount וַיִּקָּהֵ֨ל <S%H6950><s%> vai-yik-ka-Hel gathered themselves together הָעָ֜ם <S%H5971><s%> ha-'Am the people עַֽל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- about אַהֲרֹ֗ן <S%H175><s%> 'a-ha-Ron, unto Aaron וַיֹּאמְר֤וּ <S%H559><s%> vai-yo-me-Ru and said אֵלָיו֙ <S%H413><s%> 'e-Lav to him ק֣וּם׀ <S%H6965><s%> kum unto him Up עֲשֵׂה־ <S%H6213><s%> 'a-seh- make לָ֣נוּ La-nu אֱלֹהִ֗ים <S%H430><s%> E-lo-Him, us gods אֲשֶׁ֤ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher who יֵֽלְכוּ֙ <S%H1980><s%> ye-le-Chu will go לְפָנֵ֔ינוּ <S%H6440><s%> le-fa-Nei-nu, before כִּי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- for זֶ֣ה׀ <S%H2088><s%> zeh this מֹשֶׁ֣ה <S%H4872><s%> mo-Sheh us for [as for] this Moses הָאִ֗ישׁ <S%H376><s%> ha-'Ish, the man אֲשֶׁ֤ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher who הֶֽעֱלָ֙נוּ֙ <S%H5927><s%> he-'e-La-nu that brought מֵאֶ֣רֶץ <S%H776><s%> me-'E-retz us up out of the land מִצְרַ֔יִם <S%H4714><s%> mitz-Ra-yim, of Egypt לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> lo not יָדַ֖עְנוּ <S%H3045><s%> ya-Da'-nu we wot מֶה־ <S%H4100><s%> meh- what הָ֥יָה <S%H1961><s%> Ha-yah has become לֽוֹ׃ lo.

וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer said אֲלֵהֶם֙ <S%H413><s%> 'a-le-Hem about אַהֲרֹ֔ן <S%H175><s%> 'a-ha-Ron, And Aaron פָּֽרְקוּ֙ <S%H6561><s%> pa-re-Ku unto them Break off נִזְמֵ֣י <S%H5141><s%> niz-Mei earrings הַזָּהָ֔ב <S%H2091><s%> haz-za-Hav, the golden אֲשֶׁר֙ <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher which בְּאָזְנֵ֣י <S%H241><s%> be-'a-ze-Nei which [are] in the ears נְשֵׁיכֶ֔ם <S%H802><s%> ne-shei-Chem, of your wives בְּנֵיכֶ֖ם <S%H1121><s%> be-nei-Chem of your sons וּבְנֹתֵיכֶ֑ם <S%H1323><s%> u-ve-no-tei-Chem; and of your daughters וְהָבִ֖יאוּ <S%H935><s%> ve-ha-Vi-'u and bring אֵלָֽי׃ <S%H413><s%> 'e-Lai. about

וַיִּתְפָּֽרְקוּ֙ <S%H6561><s%> vai-yit-pa-re-Ku brake off כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- all הָעָ֔ם <S%H5971><s%> ha-'Am, And all the people אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- נִזְמֵ֥י <S%H5141><s%> niz-Mei earrings הַזָּהָ֖ב <S%H2091><s%> haz-za-Hav the golden אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher which בְּאָזְנֵיהֶ֑ם <S%H241><s%> be-'a-ze-nei-Hem; which [were] in their ears וַיָּבִ֖יאוּ <S%H935><s%> vai-ya-Vi-'u and brought אֶֽל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to אַהֲרֹֽן׃ <S%H175><s%> 'a-ha-Ron. [them] unto Aaron

וַיִּקַּ֣ח <S%H3947><s%> vai-yik-Kach And he received מִיָּדָ֗ם <S%H3027><s%> mi-ya-Dam, [them] at their hand וַיָּ֤צַר <S%H3335><s%> vai-Ya-tzar earthen אֹתוֹ֙ <S%H853><s%> o-To בַּחֶ֔רֶט <S%H2747><s%> ba-Che-ret, it with a graving tool וַֽיַּעֲשֵׂ֖הוּ <S%H6213><s%> vai-ya-'a-Se-hu after he had made עֵ֣גֶל <S%H5695><s%> 'E-gel calf מַסֵּכָ֑ה <S%H4541><s%> mas-se-Chah; it a molten וַיֹּ֣אמְר֔וּ <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-me-Ru, and they said אֵ֤לֶּה <S%H428><s%> 'El-leh This אֱלֹהֶ֙יךָ֙ <S%H430><s%> 'e-lo-Hei-cha These [be] thy gods יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El, O Israel אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher who הֶעֱל֖וּךָ <S%H5927><s%> he-'e-Lu-cha which brought מֵאֶ֥רֶץ <S%H776><s%> me-'E-retz thee up out of the land מִצְרָֽיִם׃ <S%H4714><s%> mitz-Ra-yim. of Egypt

וַיַּ֣רְא <S%H7200><s%> vai-Yar saw אַהֲרֹ֔ן <S%H175><s%> 'a-ha-Ron, And when Aaron וַיִּ֥בֶן <S%H1129><s%> vai-Yi-ven [it] he built מִזְבֵּ֖חַ <S%H4196><s%> miz-Be-ach an altar לְפָנָ֑יו <S%H6440><s%> le-fa-Nav; before וַיִּקְרָ֤א <S%H7121><s%> vai-yik-Ra made proclamation אַֽהֲרֹן֙ <S%H175><s%> 'a-ha-Ron it and Aaron וַיֹּאמַ֔ר <S%H559><s%> vai-yo-Mar, and said חַ֥ג <S%H2282><s%> chag [is] a feast לַיהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh to the LORD מָחָֽר׃ <S%H4279><s%> ma-Char. To morrow

וַיַּשְׁכִּ֙ימוּ֙ <S%H7925><s%> vai-yash-Ki-mu And they rose up early מִֽמָּחֳרָ֔ת <S%H4283><s%> mi-mo-cho-Rat, on the morrow וַיַּעֲל֣וּ <S%H5927><s%> vai-ya-'a-Lu and offered עֹלֹ֔ת <S%H5930><s%> 'o-Lot, burnt offerings וַיַּגִּ֖שׁוּ <S%H5066><s%> vai-yag-Gi-shu and brought שְׁלָמִ֑ים <S%H8002><s%> she-la-Mim; peace offerings וַיֵּ֤שֶׁב <S%H3427><s%> vai-Ye-shev sat הָעָם֙ <S%H5971><s%> ha-'Am and the people לֶֽאֱכֹ֣ל <S%H398><s%> le-'e-Chol down to eat וְשָׁת֔וֹ <S%H8354><s%> ve-sha-To, and to drink וַיָּקֻ֖מוּ <S%H6965><s%> vai-ya-Ku-mu and rose up לְצַחֵֽק׃ <S%H6711><s%> le-tza-Chek. to play פ Peh

וַיְדַבֵּ֥ר <S%H1696><s%> vay-dab-Ber said יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh And the LORD אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to מֹשֶׁ֑ה <S%H4872><s%> mo-Sheh; unto Moses לֶךְ־ <S%H1980><s%> lech- Go רֵ֕ד <S%H3381><s%> red get thee down כִּ֚י <S%H3588><s%> ki for שִׁחֵ֣ת <S%H7843><s%> shi-Chet have corrupted עַמְּךָ֔ <S%H5971><s%> 'am-me-Cha, for thy people אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher whom הֶעֱלֵ֖יתָ <S%H5927><s%> he-'e-Lei-ta which thou broughtest מֵאֶ֥רֶץ <S%H776><s%> me-'E-retz out of the land מִצְרָֽיִם׃ <S%H4714><s%> mitz-Ra-yim. of Egypt

סָ֣רוּ <S%H5493><s%> Sa-ru They have turned מַהֵ֗ר <S%H4118><s%> ma-Her, aside quickly מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> min- from הַדֶּ֙רֶךְ֙ <S%H1870><s%> had-De-rech out of the way אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher which צִוִּיתִ֔ם <S%H6680><s%> tziv-vi-Tim, which I commanded עָשׂ֣וּ <S%H6213><s%> 'a-Su them they have made לָהֶ֔ם la-Hem, עֵ֖גֶל <S%H5695><s%> 'E-gel calf מַסֵּכָ֑ה <S%H4541><s%> mas-se-Chah; them a molten וַיִּשְׁתַּֽחֲווּ־ <S%H7812><s%> vai-yish-ta-cha-vu- and have worshipped לוֹ֙ lo וַיִּזְבְּחוּ־ <S%H2076><s%> vai-yiz-be-chu- it and have sacrificed ל֔וֹ lo, וַיֹּ֣אמְר֔וּ <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-me-Ru, thereunto and said אֵ֤לֶּה <S%H428><s%> 'El-leh This אֱלֹהֶ֙יךָ֙ <S%H430><s%> 'e-lo-Hei-cha These [be] thy gods יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El, O Israel אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher who הֶֽעֱל֖וּךָ <S%H5927><s%> he-'e-Lu-cha which have brought thee up מֵאֶ֥רֶץ <S%H776><s%> me-'E-retz out of the land מִצְרָֽיִם׃ <S%H4714><s%> mitz-Ra-yim. of Egypt

וַיֹּ֥אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer said יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh And the LORD אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to מֹשֶׁ֑ה <S%H4872><s%> mo-Sheh; unto Moses רָאִ֙יתִי֙ <S%H7200><s%> ra-'I-ti I have seen אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הָעָ֣ם <S%H5971><s%> ha-'Am this people הַזֶּ֔ה <S%H2088><s%> haz-Zeh, this וְהִנֵּ֥ה <S%H2009><s%> ve-hin-Neh and behold עַם־ <S%H5971><s%> 'am- people קְשֵׁה־ <S%H7186><s%> ke-sheh- churlish עֹ֖רֶף <S%H6203><s%> 'O-ref stiff-necked הֽוּא׃ <S%H1931><s%> Hu. he

וְעַתָּה֙ <S%H6258><s%> ve-'at-Tah Now הַנִּ֣יחָה <S%H3240><s%> han-Ni-chah Now therefore let me alone לִּ֔י Li, וְיִֽחַר־ <S%H2734><s%> ve-yi-char- may wax hot אַפִּ֥י <S%H639><s%> 'ap-Pi that my wrath בָהֶ֖ם va-Hem וַאֲכַלֵּ֑ם <S%H3615><s%> va-'a-chal-Lem; against them and that I may consume וְאֶֽעֱשֶׂ֥ה <S%H6213><s%> ve-'e-'e-Seh them and I will make אוֹתְךָ֖ <S%H853><s%> 'ot-Cha לְג֥וֹי <S%H1471><s%> le-Goy nation גָּדֽוֹל׃ <S%H1419><s%> ga-Dol. of thee a great

וַיְחַ֣ל <S%H2470><s%> vay-Chal entreated מֹשֶׁ֔ה <S%H4872><s%> mo-Sheh, And Moses אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- פְּנֵ֖י <S%H6440><s%> pe-Nei accept יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh the LORD אֱלֹהָ֑יו <S%H430><s%> 'e-lo-Hav; his God וַיֹּ֗אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer, and said לָמָ֤ה <S%H4100><s%> la-Mah why יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh LORD יֶחֱרֶ֤ה <S%H2734><s%> ye-che-Reh wax hot אַפְּךָ֙ <S%H639><s%> 'ap-pe-Cha why doth thy wrath בְּעַמֶּ֔ךָ <S%H5971><s%> be-'am-Me-cha, against thy people אֲשֶׁ֤ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher whom הוֹצֵ֙אתָ֙ <S%H3318><s%> ho-Tze-ta which thou hast brought forth מֵאֶ֣רֶץ <S%H776><s%> me-'E-retz out of the land מִצְרַ֔יִם <S%H4714><s%> mitz-Ra-yim, of Egypt בְּכֹ֥חַ <S%H3581><s%> be-Cho-ach power גָּד֖וֹל <S%H1419><s%> ga-Dol with great וּבְיָ֥ד <S%H3027><s%> u-ve-Yad and with חֲזָקָֽה׃ <S%H2389><s%> cha-za-Kah. and with a mighty

לָמָּה֩ <S%H4100><s%> lam-Mah Why יֹאמְר֨וּ <S%H559><s%> yo-me-Ru speak מִצְרַ֜יִם <S%H4713><s%> mitz-Ra-yim Egyptian לֵאמֹ֗ר <S%H559><s%> le-Mor, and say בְּרָעָ֤ה <S%H7451><s%> be-ra-'Ah For mischief הֽוֹצִיאָם֙ <S%H3318><s%> ho-tzi-'Am did he bring לַהֲרֹ֤ג <S%H2026><s%> la-ha-Rog them out to slay אֹתָם֙ <S%H853><s%> 'o-Tam בֶּֽהָרִ֔ים <S%H2022><s%> be-ha-Rim, them in the mountains וּ֨לְכַלֹּתָ֔ם <S%H3615><s%> u-le-chal-lo-Tam, and to consume מֵעַ֖ל <S%H5921><s%> me-'Al about פְּנֵ֣י <S%H6440><s%> pe-Nei them from the face הָֽאֲדָמָ֑ה <S%H127><s%> ha-'a-da-Mah; land שׁ֚וּב <S%H7725><s%> uv break מֵחֲר֣וֹן <S%H2740><s%> me-cha-Ron from thy fierce אַפֶּ֔ךָ <S%H639><s%> 'ap-Pe-cha, wrath וְהִנָּחֵ֥ם <S%H5162><s%> ve-hin-na-Chem and repent עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- about הָרָעָ֖ה <S%H7451><s%> ha-ra-'Ah of this evil לְעַמֶּֽךָ׃ <S%H5971><s%> le-'am-Me-cha. against thy people

זְכֹ֡ר <S%H2142><s%> ze-Chor Remember לְאַבְרָהָם֩ <S%H85><s%> le-'av-ra-Ham Abraham לְיִצְחָ֨ק <S%H3327><s%> le-yitz-Chak Isaac וּלְיִשְׂרָאֵ֜ל <S%H3478><s%> u-le-Yis-ra-'El and Israel עֲבָדֶ֗יךָ <S%H5650><s%> 'a-va-Dei-cha, thy servants אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher to whom נִשְׁבַּ֣עְתָּ <S%H7650><s%> nish-Ba'-ta to whom thou swarest לָהֶם֮ la-Hem בָּךְ֒ boCh וַתְּדַבֵּ֣ר <S%H1696><s%> vat-te-dab-Ber by thine own self and saidst אֲלֵהֶ֔ם <S%H413><s%> 'a-le-Hem, to אַרְבֶּה֙ <S%H7235><s%> 'ar-Beh unto them I will multiply אֶֽת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- זַרְעֲכֶ֔ם <S%H2233><s%> zar-'a-Chem, your seed כְּכוֹכְבֵ֖י <S%H3556><s%> ke-choch-Vei as the stars הַשָּׁמָ֑יִם <S%H8064><s%> hash-sha-Ma-yim; of heaven וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> ve-chol and all הָאָ֨רֶץ <S%H776><s%> ha-'A-retz and all this land הַזֹּ֜את <S%H2063><s%> haz-Zot likewise אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher of which אָמַ֗רְתִּי <S%H559><s%> 'a-Mar-ti, that I have spoken אֶתֵּן֙ <S%H5414><s%> 'et-Ten of will I give לְזַרְעֲכֶ֔ם <S%H2233><s%> le-zar-'a-Chem, unto your seed וְנָחֲל֖וּ <S%H5157><s%> ve-na-cha-Lu and they shall inherit לְעֹלָֽם׃ <S%H5769><s%> le-'o-Lam. [it] for ever

וַיִּנָּ֖חֶם <S%H5162><s%> vai-yin-Na-chem repented יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh; And the LORD עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- about הָ֣רָעָ֔ה <S%H7451><s%> ha-ra-'Ah, of the evil אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher which דִּבֶּ֖ר <S%H1696><s%> dib-Ber which he thought לַעֲשׂ֥וֹת <S%H6213><s%> la-'a-Sot to do לְעַמּֽוֹ׃ <S%H5971><s%> le-'am-Mo. unto his people פ Peh
